BookData.Title: Harry Potter and the sorcerer's stone
BookData.TitleLong: Harry Potter and the sorcerer's stone
BookData.AuthorsText: by J. K. Rowling; illustrations by Mary Grandpré
BookData.PublisherText: New York : Arthur A. Levine Books, 1998, c1997.
BookData.Summary: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School for Wizards and Witches.
BookData.Notes: Published by arrangement with Bloomsbury Pub. Plc. Harry Potter's first adventure.
